Shapes3D.Shape3D

  • Uses of Shape3D in Shapes3D

    Subclasses of Shape3D in Shapes3D
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Cone
    The `Cone` class represents a three-dimensional cone shape.
    class 
    Cylinder
    Represents a three-dimensional cylinder shape.
    class 
    OctagonalPrism
    Represents a three-dimensional octagonal prism shape.
    class 
    PentagonalPrism
    Represents a three-dimensional pentagonal prism shape.
    class 
    Pyramid
    Represents a three-dimensional pyramid shape.
    class 
    SquarePrism
    Represents a three-dimensional square prism shape.
    class 
    TriangularPrism
    Represents a three-dimensional triangular prism shape.

    Method
    Description
    static Shape3D[]
    ShapeFileReader.readShapesFromFile(String fileName)
    Reads 3D shapes from a text file and returns an array of Shape3D objects.
